alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 9:42PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN COCHISE COUNTY THROUGH 1030 PM MST... At 941 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Benson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson, Mescal, and Cascabel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 298 and 312, and between mile markers 327 and 329. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 297. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
